about_the_game: Yike Adventure is the pioneering work of Yike Game Studio (Yike Game Brand) and also the predecessor of Yike Empire Mini Edition. This game is an RPG turn based puzzle game. After entering the game, players need to use the directional keys on the mini keyboard to control the walking of the game's characters, space keys for character dialogue and the occurrence of things. There is also a store function in the game. In the lower left corner of the birth point, use the space bar to chat with merchants, open the store list, and there will be more powerful weapons and equipment for you to choose from. Upgrading characters and YK coins in the backpack require defeating monsters to obtain experience and coins. There are two forces in the easternmost and southernmost sides of the map, and players will need to win the monsters to gain experience and coins. In addition to receiving main quests, one can also receive side quests at these two locations, become a savior, save the people from the clutches of monsters, and become a savior hero; It mainly tells the story of the protagonist Yike KLSD, K Brother, Thor, and Emperor Jin, who receive missions from King Taisho Sibei to resist the invasion of monsters in the southern part of Yike City and explore a new world.
